pathAssistantSteps.info:
Definition- The contract/deal has been disqualified.

Required- Please populate the closed disqualified reason and closed comments with as much details as possible.

Definition- The contract/deal has been lost.

Required- Please populate the closed lost reason and closed comments with as much details as possible. Update the competitors field too.

Definition- The contract/deal has been signed. Once the contract has been signed, the opportunity can then be converted into an order.  

Required- Please populate the closed won reason and closed comments with as much details as possible. Update the competitors field too.

Definition- Has been approved from buyer to move forward, now working on legal, InfoSec or any combination.  At this point we are awaiting signature from the client.

If a Contract/Master Service Agreement was sent to the prospect, please set to true the Contract/MSA Attached checkbox.

Required - The Sales to Delivery Briefing Form is now required for all Corporate Services opportunities. Please fill out this form, attach the PDF submission to the Files section, and then set the 'Delivery Form Attached' checkbox to true. Find Form Here

Definition- Sales rep has ran a successful first call with the prospect, (ICP), uncovered Pain/ Problems and agreed the client wants to fix these problems.

Required- The problem identified text field must be filled in as well as the opportunity amount (estimate), the close date, event start date, discovery date, and at least one competitor (populate N/A if unknown)

Definition- Prospect has agreed to set time to review a pricing / offering proposal. Sales rep will show the proposed solution correlated back to the problems uncovered during Discovery and Demo.

Required- At least one product and one quote must be attached to the Opportunity by this point. Once the quote has been finalized, the proposal must be sent out and the date field populated.

Definition- Sales Qualified Opportunity. This is where new opportunities will begin always. This can happen via a BDR converting a Lead who has confirmed a meeting on the calendar with the proper contact (ICP defined), has uncovered pain/ problem and put this into the Opportunity Activity/Task section. Otherwise a Sales rep can manually generate an Opp here.

Definition- We have put together a custom demo with a pre-sales engineer or with the Sales Executive to deliver a customized offering, based on the discovery phase of the sale.

Required- At least one Client Contact Roles must be added and the Discovery Status field must be populated to Completed. This will automatically occur when a related Discovery Event to the Opportunity is updated to Completed there. Also please add any opportunity team members that may be involved.
Definition- Prospect has given us the "verbal agreement" to move forward with us as the selected vendor. The Contract is created and sent to the prospect with the PO# and Billing Information.
